nodes.bodyText: Mind providing some background or explanation in the PR comments on what this and how it works? Based on the PR alone I'm assuming there is some internal pluming that handles running these permutations but it is not abundantly clear on what based on the code changes.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,8 @@ jobs:
       ServiceDirectory: appconfiguration
       EnvVars:
         AZURE_TEST_MODE: RECORD
+        AZURE_TEST_HTTP_CLIENTS: ALL
+        AZURE_APPCONFIG_TEST_SERVICE_VERSIONS: ALL
